message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient is likely experiencing a migraine headache, and chlorpromazine is an appropriate therapy for the associated vomiting. Propranolol and calcium channel blockers are used in migraine prophylaxis, while ergonovine is used to treat postpartum hemorrhage or to diagnose coronary artery spasm.
